analysis.key_quote: The proposed classification changes—particularly the establishment of a new “Schedule Policy/Career” track—must not become a backdoor mechanism for reclassifying nonpartisan career roles into positions vulnerable to political influence or at-will dismissal.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of preserving nonpartisan roles and the risks of politicization, which aligns with concerns about merit-based systems and due process protections for civil servants.
